resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
shiro615 commented on pull request #5440: ARROW-6619: [Ruby] Add support for building Gandiva::Expression by Arrow::Schema#build_expression
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5440
 
 
   This is the first attempt to make Red Gandiva API better.
   This PR adds `Arrow::Schema#build_expression`, which aims to build `Gandiva::Expression` with FunctionNode or IfNode easily.
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

kou commented on pull request #5440: ARROW-6619: [Ruby] Add support for building Gandiva::Expression by Arrow::Schema#build_expression
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5440#discussion_r326820150
 
 

 ##########
 File path: ruby/red-gandiva/lib/gandiva/field-node.rb
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,64 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+module Gandiva
+  class FieldNode
+    def +(node)
+      build_function_node("add", node)
 
 Review comment:
   We should not convert to `Gandiva::Node` here.
   If we convert to `Gandiva::Node` here, we can't combine more expression: `record.field1 + record.field2 + record.field3`
   
   We should keep internal builder objects while evaluating expression builder block (the block passed to `Arrow::Schema#build_expression`). We should convert the internal builder objects after evaluation expression builder block:
   
   ```ruby
   module Arrow
     class Schema
       def build_expression(&block)
         builder = Gandiva::ExpressionBuilder.new(self)
         builder.build(&block)
       end
     end
   end
   
   module Gandiva
     class ExpressionBuilder
       def initialize(schema)
         @schema = schema
       end
   
       def build
         # Not node = yield(...)
         builder = yield(Record.new(@schema), Context.new(@schema))
         builder.build
       end
     end
   end
   ```
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

 Review comment:
   How about creating `ExpressionBuilder` and just use in `Arrow::Schema#build_expression` instead of putting details to this module?
   
   ```ruby
   module Arrow
     class Schema
       def build_expression(&block)
         builder = Gandiva::ExpressionBuilder.new(self)
         builder.build(&block)
       end
   end 
   ```

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

fields.description:
This is the first attempt to make Red Gandiva API better.
This adds Arrow::Schema#build_expression, which aims to build Gandiva::Expression with FunctionNode or IfNode easily.
fields.summary: [Ruby] Add support for building Gandiva::Expression by Arrow::Schema#build_expression
